files.help: Supported by default since less version [598](https://greenwoodsoftware.com/less/news.598.html). You can move the file to _$XDG_STATE_HOME/lesshst_.
Supported by default since less version [590](https://greenwoodsoftware.com/less/news.590.html). You can move the file to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/lesskey_.
